sentences.en: Bony prominences are padded with cotton sheeting.
sentences.cn: 要在骨头突起处垫上大片棉花.

sentences.en: He eats so little that he is bony.
sentences.cn: 他吃得太少,瘦得只剩皮包骨.

sentences.en: He had a bony gentle face with bushy eyebrows.
sentences.cn: 他的脸憔悴,温和,眉毛很浓.

sentences.en: He poked a long bony finger in Billy's chest.
sentences.cn: 他用细长的手指捅了一下比利的胸口。

sentences.en: He was a tall , bony, sharp - eyed man in a brown felt hat.
sentences.cn: 那人瘦高, 目光敏锐,戴了一顶棕色呢帽.

sentences.en: I looked at him, at the long, bony , almost Lincolnesque face.
sentences.cn: 我瞅着他, 瞅着他那张颇象林肯的脸庞,长长的脸棱角外露.

sentences.en: On the horizon the bony hills shone like picked bleached bones piled high.
sentences.cn: 远远望去,地平线上的重重山峦恰似垒得很高的一堆堆的白骨.

sentences.en: Relatively few bony structures can be felt in the cervical region.
sentences.cn: 相对来说,颈部的骨性结构不易摸到.

sentences.en: She folded her bony hands in her lap and looked directly at Michael.
sentences.cn: 她双手并起,放在膝上,直盯盯地望着迈克尔.

sentences.en: She had a bony intelligent face.
sentences.cn: 她的脸很瘦，看来很聪明。

sentences.en: She suddenly held up a small, bony finger and pointed across the room.
sentences.cn: 她突然伸出一根瘦小的手指，指向屋子的另一头。

sentences.en: That steak is bony and difficult to eat.
sentences.cn: 那种牛排多骨,很不易吃.

sentences.en: The armadillo has a protective shell of bony plates.
sentences.cn: 犰狳有角质鳞片的护甲.

sentences.en: The fish we caught were too bony to eat.
sentences.cn: 我们捕来的鱼刺太多,不能吃.

sentences.en: Their belts are pulled tight against their bony frames.
sentences.cn: 他们的腰带紧紧裹着瘦骨嶙峋的身体。

words.tran_cn: 骨骼的；去掉骨头的；用骨架撑起的；施过骨粉料的；去骨的
骨；骨骼；香烟；一首歌；vt. 剔去...的骨；施骨肥于；vi. 苦学；专心致志
骨的；多骨的；瘦骨嶙峋的；似骨的

trans.tran_cn: 骨瘦如柴的，骨质的，（鱼）多刺的
trans.tran_en: someone or part of their body that is bony is very thin
